Alert Name: bush
Paulson: China must push for reform
Treasury chief says economic reforms are needed to increase domestic consumption and reduce reliance on investment, exports to drive growth.
06/20/07 12:17 PM, EDT
U.S. Treasury Secretary Henry Paulson said Wednesday that China is helping to power the strongest global growth in decades, but as a major economic participant, China must address the need for economic reforms.
